patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses:
Our college has different teaching patterns than other colleges. We adopt a teaching methodology, following the LTP techniques which stands for Lecture, Tutorial and Practical.
Every course has designated Theory, Lab and Tutorial hours so that the student is engaged in every way for that course without losing the essence of the domain.
There are assignments, projects and written exams. The assignments have deadlines which you should not exceed if you want to get better marks.
You can message us here at any hours. But our college premises will be open from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm from Monday to Saturday only.
